info.name: vSphere Automation REST Resources for appliance
info.description: The folders within this collection represent the Rest API resources and the different operations that can be performed on each. These are individual requests. In many cases, each request will require input that would come from other requests. It is left up to the user to insert the correct data into the URL, query parameters and request bodies for the requests to work correctly. Refer to the ReST API Documentation for further help.

exec: tests["Response time is less than 1000ms"] = responseTime < 1000;

request.description: Login to the specified vCenter and retrieve a session
